choices.name: Bug
choices.choiceText: Support Case, Data Update or Question

Flow.description: Flow used to create cases or work items for various BW teams

formulas.description: Increments the due date by 12 hours to handle time zones
formulas.name: forDueDate_plus_12

Flow.label: Work Request

recordCreates.description: Creates work for all request types
recordCreates.name: rcCreate_Work
recordCreates.label: Create Work - All request types

recordCreates.description: Fault actions is used for users who don't have access to the case object.
recordCreates.name: rcCreateCase
recordCreates.label: CreateCase

fields.name: AttachFiles
fields.fieldText: You can attach files to your new {!forRequestType} below.

fields.name: scrFileInfo
fields.fieldText: A list of attached files will be displayed on the confirmation screen.

fields.name: scrSubjectCase_Prod
fields.fieldText: Subject

fields.name: Request_Type
fields.fieldText: What's the best category for your request?

fields.name: scrDetails_Prod
fields.fieldText:
We'll need some information in order to help. In the Details and Steps to Reproduce section below, please provide as much information about the problem as you can.
If applicable, please include:
- The steps taken before running into the bug
- Links to the pages or records where the bug occurred
- The time at which the bug occurred
- Screenshots / files should be included on the next screen.

fields.name: scrDetails_and_Steps_to_Reproduce_Prod
fields.fieldText: Details and Steps to Reproduce

fields.name: scrPriority_Prod
fields.fieldText: Priority
fields.helpText:
Critical
  • Critical production issue affecting all users.
  • Includes system unavailability and data integrity issues with no workaround available.
    • Urgent
  • Major functionality is impacted or significant performance degradation is experienced.
  • Issue is persistent and affects many users and/or major functionality.
  • No reasonable workaround available.
    • High
  • System performance issue or bug affecting some, but not all users.
  • Short-term workaround is available, but cannot be scaled.
    • Medium
  • Inquiry or question
  • Reasonable workaround available
  • Resolution required as soon as reasonably practicable.

fields.name: CaseCreated_0
fields.fieldText:
Your {!forRequestType} has been created and can be viewed in Salesforce here.

Attached Files: {!varFileNames}

fields.name: dispPrioritization
fields.fieldText: For questions about prioritization, please contact the Product Owner, {!varProductOwnerName}.

fields.name: outNoTeam
fields.fieldText: This team has not been setup in the request tool. Please contact Biz Apps for assistance.

fields.name: dlProduct_Line_Ops
fields.fieldText: Product Line

fields.name: dispOpsPriorities
fields.fieldText: P4 = Lowest Priority â†’ P0 = Highest Priority

fields.name: dlPriority_Ops
fields.fieldText: Priority
fields.helpText:
What is the priority of your request?
P1 = Stop everything and do this now P2 = Make this a priority on top of whatever you were going to do next P3 = This needs to get done but don't interrupt regular work queue P4 = This would be nice to have

fields.name: inpWork_Request_Title_Ops
fields.fieldText: Work Request Title

fields.name: inpDescription_Ops
fields.fieldText: Please describe your request in detail:

fields.name: dateReq_date_Ops
fields.fieldText: What is the requested date?

fields.name: inpDue_Date_Desc_Ops
fields.fieldText: What is driving this due date?

validationRule.errorMessage: Your description must be less than 255 characters.

fields.name: Files_Ops
fields.fieldText: You'll be able to attach files in the next screen.

screens.name: scrWhat_team_is_this_request_for

fields.name: inpTeam
fields.fieldText: What team is this work request for?

screens.description: What group is your request for?

screens.label: What group is your request for?

fields.name: dispGroupSelectionText
fields.fieldText: What group will be fulfilling your request?

fields.name: dispCaseOpened
fields.fieldText: Your {!varTeamName} support case has been opened and you will receive a confirmation email shortly. If you have any files or screen shots that would be helpful in resolving the case, please respond to that email and attach the files.
